ID: text = / atikataṃ aṃt[a]raṃ bahūni vāsa-satāni vaḍhito eva praṇāraṃbho vihiṃsa ca bhūtānāṃ ñātīsu / a[s]aṃpratipati brā[m]haṇa-sramaṇānāṃ asaṃpratīpatī
text = ta aja Devānaṃpriyasa Priyadasino rāño / dhaṃma-caraṇena [bhe]rī-ghoso aho dhaṃma-ghoso vimāna-darsaṇā ca hastida[sa]ṇā ca / agi-kh[a]ṃdhāni ca [a]ñāni ca divyāni rūpāni dasayitpā janaṃ

text = yārise bahūhi v[āsa]satehi / na bhūta-puve tarise aja vaḍhite Devānaṃpriyasa Priyadasino rāño dhaṃmānusasṭiyā anāraṃ/[bh]o prāṇānaṃ avihāsā bhūtānaṃ ñātīnaṃ saṃpaṭipatī bramhaṇa-sarnaṇānaṃ saṃpaṭipatī mātari pitari / [s]usrusā thaira-susrusā
text = esa añe ca bahuvidhe [dha]ṃma-caraṇe va[ḍhi]te
text = vaḍhayisati ceva Devānaṃpriyo / [Pri]ya[da]si rājā dhaṃma-[ca]raṇaṃ idaṃ
text = putrā ca [p]otrā ca prapotrā ca Devānaṃpriyasa Priyadasino rāño / [pra]vadhayisaṃti idaṃ [dha]ṃma-caraṇaṃ ava savaṭa-kapā dhaṃmamhi sīlamhi tisṭaṃto [dha]ṃmaṃ anusāsisaṃti
text = / [e]sa hi sesṭe kamme ya dhaṃmānusāsanaṃ
text = [ta] imamhi athamhi / [va]dhī ca ahīnī ca sādhu
text = e[t]āya athāya ida[ṃ] lekhāpitaṃ imasa atha[sa] v[a]dhi yujaṃtu hīni c[a] / [no] locetavyā
text = dbadasa-vāsābhisitena Devān[a]ṃpriyena Priyadasinā rāñ[ā] idam lekhapitam
